directions: In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat.  Toss in garlic and saute 1 to 2 minutes, until slightly golden.  Mix chopped tomatoes into pan. Stir in chicken stock, thinning with 1 to 2 tablespoons water if necessary.  Cook over medium heat until bubbly.  Stir in Vermouth and cook 5 minutes more.  Mix in basil just before serving.
title: Best Spaghetti Sauce in the World
